Sony Computer Entertainment

Sony Computer Entertainment America, a division of Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc., distributes and markets the PlayStation game console in North America, develops and publishes software for the PlayStation game console, and manages the U.S. third party licensing program. Based in Foster City, California, Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc. is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

Company Info

Foster City, CA 94404
